name: UNKNOWN_COMMAND
description: The received command byte does not relate to any known command.

name: NOT_INITIALISED
description: The Ryder is not initialised with a wallet.

name: MEMORY_ERROR
description: The Ryder encountered a memory error while processing the command or input.

name: APP_DOMAIN_TOO_LONG
description: The provided app domain is too long to be processed. This error code precedes the memory error code.

name: APP_DOMAIN_INVALID
description: The app domain does not start with `http://` or `https://`.

name: MNEMONIC_TOO_LONG
description: The provided mnemonic phrase is too long to be processed. This error code precedes the memory error code.

name: MNEMONIC_INVALID
description: The mnemonic phrase has an invalid word count or the checksum failed.

name: GENERATE_MNEMONIC
description: The Ryder could not generate a mnemonic phrase of the desired strength.

name: INPUT_TIMEOUT
description: The client waited too long with sending input. (Unimplemented.)

name: NOT_IMPLEMENTED
description: Prototype response code to indicate that the current feature is still being worked on.
